snippet: In a world that recognizes female composers more readily, Pauline Oliveros has captured enough ears, shaped enough minds and accrued enough renown to warrant a claim of greatness.
abstract: Composer Pauline Oliveros, who celebrates her 80th birthday this year, has been a trailblazer in classical music from an early age.
lead_paragraph: In a world that recognizes female composers more readily, Pauline Oliveros has captured enough ears, shaped enough minds and accrued enough renown to warrant a claim of greatness.

headline.seo: The Composer Pauline Oliveros Stays Busy at 80
headline.main: Strange Sounds Led a Composer to a Long Career
headline.print_headline: Strange Sounds Led a Composer To a Long Career
